## ApiReadonlyMixin.isBaseClassOf() function

A type guard that tests whether the specified `ApiItem` subclass extends the `ApiReadonlyMixin` mixin.

**Signature:**

```typescript
function isBaseClassOf(apiItem: ApiItem): apiItem is ApiReadonlyMixin;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  apiItem | [ApiItem](./api-extractor-model.apiitem.md) |  |

**Returns:**

apiItem is [ApiReadonlyMixin](./api-extractor-model.apireadonlymixin.md)

## Remarks

The JavaScript `instanceof` operator cannot be used to test for mixin inheritance, because each invocation of the mixin function produces a different subclass. (This could be mitigated by `Symbol.hasInstance`<></>, however the TypeScript type system cannot invoke a runtime test.)
